CustomField.formula: IF(not(isblank(OLY_Complaint__c)), HYPERLINK ("/" & OLY_Complaint__c , OLY_Complaint__r.Name,"_blank"), IF(not(isblank(OLY_Inquiry__c)), HYPERLINK ("/" & OLY_Inquiry__c , OLY_Inquiry__r.Name,"_blank"), IF(not(isblank(OLY_Investigation__c)), HYPERLINK ("/" & OLY_Investigation__c, OLY_Investigation__r.Name , "_blank"),"")))
CustomField.label: Parent Record
